description:
An elderly lady who was knocked over by a toy car, refused to get up and move out of its way until the driver 'paid compensation.'一名老妇被玩具车撞倒后不愿意起来，坐在地上不愿离开道儿，要等到“付了赔偿金”才好。

She sat on the floor on the sidewalk in front of the toddler who drove the red toy car, her parents, and some bystanders. It is not clear exactly what happened when the car hit.她坐在人行道上，面前是开红色遥控车的小孩和家长，还有些旁观者。车撞的时候到底发生了什么并不清楚。

The unidentified woman allegedly said the vehicle was speeding without a licence on the sidewalk - it seems she did not quite grasp the fact that it was a kid’s toy.这位不具姓名的女士声称，车子未上牌照在人行道上超速行驶，似乎她并没有搞清楚这是辆小孩的玩具车。

In the dispute on the street, the child’s mother can be heard shouting at the woman: ‘I was walking over here and you were walking over there.'他们在马路上争执，可以听到小孩的妈妈对女人大声道，“我在这儿走，但你在那儿走。”

The elderly lady sitting down in front of the car is heard disagreeing with her. Meanwhile the little girl, who looks only about five, was seen looking sheepish while holding her mother's hand.老妇坐在车子前，可以听到她持不同意见。与此同时，小女孩看上去才五岁， 怯生生地拉着妈妈的手。

Some people agreed with the elderly lady and felt sorry for her arguing that her bones are brittle and she should have been helped. Others claimed that it was all a scam.It is unclear if the woman was given money or even went to the hospitals for her alleged injuries.老妇称骨头脆弱，一些人表示同意，对老妇很是同情，认为应该帮帮她的。其他人则认为这纯粹就是讹诈。尚不清楚有没有给她钱，也不知道有否因为她声称受了伤而去医院。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 最高碰瓷境界：中国大妈碰瓷玩具车惊呆老外
